name: Internet Cafe Mini Games 10 in 1
description:
Imagine an internet cafe that contains 10 fun little games. You can play any game you want in this internet cafe. Try to get the highest score in simple games by managing your character with a single button.
Small games included:
Backward Dragon

Downhill

Flappy Cloud

Flight of the Albatross

Jelly Forest

Lane Runner

Minimal 2D Run

Minimal 3D Run

A Sunny Day

Vertical Jumper
